fields.summary: ec2:Region condition no longer works when used with multiple regions

comments.body: [~hspencer], support for the ec2:Region condition key with federated regions was added in EUCA-10479, so I think after the version you were testing. Before that fix, the region would always be "eucalyptus".
We should retest this now that the functionality is implemented.

The described behaviour is as expected and applies to any statement with a condition (i.e. it is not ec2:Region specific). This is a difference in behaviour from AWS but was not (as per my understanding) what this issue was intended to address.

[~sjones],

Understood.  Would you like for me to raise a separate ticket to track error responses for this scenario?
[~hspencer], yes please open a separate issue for the missing error response.
